Publication Title: RAD-TGTs: high-throughput measurement of cellular mechanotype via rupture and delivery of DNA tension probes
Publication Authors: Matthew R Pawlak, Adam T Smiley, Maria Paz Ramirez, Marcus D Kelly, Ghaidan A Shamsan, Sarah M Anderson, Branden A Smeester, David A Largaespada, David J Odde, Wendy R Gordon
Publication Abstract: Mechanical forces drive critical cellular processes that are reflected in mechanical phenotypes, or mechanotypes, of cells and their microenvironment.
